cards.title: ('Printer offline: {0}, exposing printing security and reliability risks.' -f $name)

scenarios.title: Potential Issue – Generic misconfiguration
steps: Use Evidence to target failing component; review services, logs, and policies.

cards.title: ('Printers using WSD ports: {0}, exposing printing security and reliability risks.' -f ($wsdPrintersList -join ', ')
cards.explanation: This card indicates '('Printers using WSD ports: {0}, exposing printing security and reliability risks.' -f ($wsdPrintersList -join ', ')'. Investigate configuration, service state, permissions, and recent changes impacting this area.
cards.evidence: WSD ports are less reliable for enterprise printing; prefer Standard TCP/IP.

troubleshooting.overview: This card indicates '('Printers using WSD ports: {0}, exposing printing security and reliability risks.' -f ($wsdPrintersList -join ', ')'. Investigate configuration, service state, permissions, and recent changes impacting this area.

scenarios.title: Potential Issue – Firewall/network ACLs blocking ports
steps: Enable profiles and allow required ports.

scripts.name: Enable profiles & test
